::DrillBit::

"We'll only send to a minimal range. Just a stake out, not an attack.
Any one going in or out will most likely pass them. When they do, kill
them."
He turned to StarScream and Dollen.
"You two are to go. Be carefull."

::Dollen::

"No problem. Any chance to destroy bots is good."
He runs off to the exit.

::Hot Rod::

He still sat at the table, in the CF.
"IR calls for a meeting, but then our hostes doesn't show," he wispered
more to himself.
